function Layout({activeNote, onDeleteNote, onUpdateNote}) { const onEdit = (key, value) => { onUpdateNote({ ...activeNote, [key]: value, dateCreated: Date.now(), }); }; return( <>

onEdit("title", e.target.value)} autoFocus />
